extendedInfo.description: Radio Hartlepool listen online, send TXT messages to the studio, view the webcam and see what song and presenter is currently on-air with our official 102.4FM Radio Hartlepool Application.You can stream directly within this application to listen wherever you are (providing you have sufficient data connectivity, 3G or better recommended). You can also quickly send a TXT straight into the studio (sends a txt to 60300 so standard network charges apply), view the webcam and also see what show and presenter is currently on-air.

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: Every time. Shame I really wanted this to work. Samsung Galaxy Tab
reviews.author: A Google User
